description: Classic Lasagne with red meat sauce.

directions.step: Prepare the white sauce by mixing ricotta with the Béchamel sauce until completely smooth and set aside.
With a pasta machine flatten the pasta to thin sheets and cut them into ten inch sections. (if you stack them, flour liberally between each one to prevent them from sticking.)
Boil salted water in a large pot. (put in a teaspoon of oil to prevent the sheets from sticking.)
Flash boil each pasta sheet, one at a time, in the water and set aside in a bowl of cold water to cool.
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.
Cover the bottom of a 10 by 15 inch baking tin with a thin layer of sauce.
Assemble the lasagna by alternating layers of Pasta sheets, red sauce, white sauce and parmesan.
Now add a final layer of pasta, white sauce and parmesan to create a nice crisp crust.
Bake in the oven for about one hour.
When the edges of the top pasta layer start brown, set the oven to broil for about 5 minutes (or until a nice golden-brown crust is formed).
